short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab with Eevee from Pokémon! Enjoy a fun live wallpaper of Eevee and enhance your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With easy access to your favorite websites, you can add custom shortcuts and personalize your new tab. Stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock, while searching the web effortlessly through your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Delight in Eevee’s animated presence on your new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly access your most visited sites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize with your own links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of time and dates right on your new tab.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web easily with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
